member.name: T:EventManagement.Data.Models.Event
member.summary: This class is marked as table in the Database. This represents events Table in local Database.

member.name: M:EventManagement.Data.Models.Event.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:EventManagement.Data.Models.Event.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets Id. this property of Class represents Id for table events. It is unique for every instance and is automatically generated.

member.name: P:EventManagement.Data.Models.Event.Name
member.summary: Gets or Sets Name attribute of the class. This field stores the Name of the Event. This is manadatory property and it's Max Length can be 50.

member.name: P:EventManagement.Data.Models.Event.Tickets
member.summary: Gets Tickets attribute of the class. This virtual field stores the collection of tickets which relates to specific Event.

member.name: P:EventManagement.Data.Models.Event.Place
member.summary: Gets or Sets Place attribute of the class. This field stores the name of the Place where Event is going to be organized. This is manadatory property and it's Max Length can be 50.

member.name: P:EventManagement.Data.Models.Event.OganizarName
member.summary: Gets or Sets OganizarName attribute of the class. This field stores the name of the Organizer who is responsible for organize the event. This is manadatory property and it's Max Length can be 50.

member.name: P:EventManagement.Data.Models.Event.StartDate
member.summary: Gets or Sets StartDate attribute of the class. This field stores the date when the event start. This is manadatory property and it's Max Length can be 50.

member.name: P:EventManagement.Data.Models.Event.EndDate
member.summary: Gets or Sets EndDate attribute of the class. This field stores the date when the event will end. This is manadatory property and it's Max Length can be 50.
